title: Collaborative Media Production Project in Science: Strengthening Multimedia Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A science education program for general citizens. Develops science communication skills through project-based collaborative learning, conducted in environments supported by digital devices (laptops, tablets, smart devices, etc.).

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively produce a 3-minute educational video effectively conveying scientific concepts
Learners can plan content that complies with copyright and information ethics standards during digital media production
Learners can refine media projects by incorporating feedback and conduct self/peer assessments using a rubric for peer evaluation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
